website_summaries.verdict: Classic ballet flat, perfect for a bride who also wants to be able to dance at her wedding.
pros: Suede or patent leather that's comfortable and flexible
Great to throw in a travel bag
cons: Like slippers, they are very flat with no arch support

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Had my last pair for 3 years :) SO comfortable and they go with anything :) also easy to store in your purse of you want to use them as the flats you change into after your feet start hurting in your heels when you're out :) I usually wear an 8.5 but couldn't remember if my old ones were 8.5 or a 9 so I played it safe and ordered a 9. SLIGHTLY big but def still wearable :) so obviously they run true to size :)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn DiBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect staple work flats
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a staple pair of flats for work and this seems like the one, especially for price point. I saw other reviewers suggested to get half size up and I'm very glad that I did so. Not sure about durability yet, but so good so far. Now I just need to put gel inserts and I'm good to go. It has okay light padding, but I prefer to have gel inserts that will help with my arch and the back of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like how they run a little on the narrower side ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd time ordering but 1st from time amazon and these run SHORTER than what the other 2 that I purchased in years past, same size and everything. They DID stretch where they do not hurt the top of my big toe anymore but the first few times wearing I could feel some uncomfortableness. I like how they run a little on the narrower side because so do my feet although I normally just buy regular sizing.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flats - size up half a size from your normal
customer_reviews.text: These are prefect flats- like all Vince Camuto shoes they run small. I purchased my "Vince size" with this knowledge in mind and my flats fit perfectly. Powder Blush is a flattering nude colorway
customer_reviews.author: ChicMomUpState

customer_reviews.title: maybe they'll stretch out and fit better, " but I don't even want to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in my normal size 8 and they are WAY too small. My toes pushed into the front of the toe box, and the back of the shoe dug into the back of my ankle. I kept thinking, "Hey, maybe they'll stretch out and fit better," but I don't even want to wear them to stretch them out. I hardly walked in them around the house, but just realized it wasn't worth it to have shoes I don't even want to wear. They are cute, and they have no arch support (being ballet flats and all), but I like the elastic stretch around the top of the shoe. These are going back and I'll try a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Restock please!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the vince camuto ballet flat and my daughter has also found them to be quite comfortable. Now I am searching for more, especially in different colors and patterns. Please bring them back. You have only got leftovers of your size 5 or 6. Are you going to restock them in the fun colors and patterns. I had my heart on a pink pair but they sold out before I could order any more. I Please we would like to see the bright colors for the size 7 or 8. The other ballets flats that are available in different brand names does not compare. You have a permanent customer! Please restock your supply!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Crudele

customer_reviews.title: I bought the same exact type at Bloomingdales and it was comfortable. I wanted to buy another pair and found ...
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. I bought the same exact type at Bloomingdales and it was comfortable. I wanted to buy another pair and found it on Amazon. this pair LOOKS great but is NOT the same feel at all. Very uncomfortable, actually hurts to wear. Makes me wonder exactly where it was made.
customer_reviews.author: MEISHA

customer_reviews.title: shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have the same shoe bought in store and was looking for same pair to wear as newer looking since I lked them so well. these were same size a 61/2 but tend to run a little smaller. fit ,but a little tighter than I would like.
customer_reviews.author: JDV

customer_reviews.title: Best Black Flats!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend these little black flats. If you need a staple for your wardrobe, these are it. Sturdy, comfortable, cute, and functional! They make it though a whole fall/winter/spring in New England without completely fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: but the 9 is fine. I will say they are squeaking A LOT
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute. Read reviews and saw that they ran small so ordered a 1/2 size larger. I normally wear an 8.5 and got a 9. I think now that I have tried them the 8.5 would have worked for me, but the 9 is fine. I will say they are squeaking A LOT. I don't know if that's because they are a bit roomy or what, but if you are in a quiet room it's really obvious! Very comfortable, great color and beautiful quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: In time for the Spring
customer_reviews.text: A cute ballet flat. Accommodates my slightly wide feet very comfortably. The reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the box of the shoe, although generously sized, presses down on top of your toe nail. The downside is that it rubs off your nail polish on your big toe.
customer_reviews.author: Sele

customer_reviews.title: Need breaking in. The fabric is tearing apart my ...
customer_reviews.text: Need breaking in. The fabric is tearing apart my heel, top of feet around the seam, and overall rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Nice, basic flat. Nice leather.
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot. incl the heel. These fit nicely and look cute. The leather is good looking. Appear as pictured. I wear an 8.5 narrow. With the elastic top the 9med fits fine. I have found that I need the next size up in length in ballet flats.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPaddler

customer_reviews.title: Really like this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shoe. Found a pair at Nordies Rack that fit perfectly. Same name etc but these were a little tighter around the ankle part.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gamble purchasing sight unseen, but based on previous reviews, I took a chance. These shoes are exactly what I was looking for and more! Fantastic quality, incredible comfort, perfect sizing! The leather is buttery soft with slight texture, yet sturdy. The shape is perfect, with slight toe cleavage. No cutting into heal. Elastic around top is just enough to keep shoe comfortably on, yet not so tight that it cuts or causes shoe to curl. I anticipate purchasing more as I will wear these all the time. I couldn't be happier and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: valerie diaz

customer_reviews.title: I'm obsessed with these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 2 other colors of the same shoe. I have a serious problem with most flats - they cause blisters in the back by rubbing. These do not rub at all and I can wear them everywhere. They have no support, so you're not going to get that, but for comfort, they're excellent. I don't know what the other review is talking about when it says they run big. I found the opposite. I'm usually an 8 1/2 or a 9 and I ordered a 9 and it is very roomy. In fact, I could have probably gone with an 8 1/2 but the 9 is very wearable. I didn't find the shoes abnormally sized at all.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but definitely check your foot width.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, but they are cut very narrow and I have a narrow foot. I get rubbing on the sides of my big toe and pinky from them. I still love wearing them because the soles are padded and very comfortable. Update : these shoes don't breathe and get stinky quickly. They are also not very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: I own several Vince Camuto heels, all in a size 5.5. For these Ellen flats, I opted to go a half size up and I'm glad I did. It fits securely enough that it doesn't slip off of my feet or look oddly loose. At the same time, there's room when my feet swell up a little bit later on in the day. Very comfortable and versatile. There's enough padding so that it doesn't feel like you're walking on a bare floor. The leather is also pliable and resilient.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Long Family

customer_reviews.title: great color and fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I bought them in fuschia, and I'm surprised at how often I wear them. I wear a lot of neutrals and navy blue, so these are great accessories. The fit is true to size, and they're SO comfortable. They're very cushioned on the inside. I've taken them on a few trips and walked around in them all day, and they held up great. The only potential downside is that they're a little shinier in real life than the photo shows. Not patent leather, but pretty glossy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate K.

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday flats
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 7, it fits with out slipping but its pretty snug around the toes. The neutral color matches with everything and its my go-to work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but size up
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying and noticed that several people recommended to size up. I am typically a size 9 so I ordered a 9 1/2 and they are still a bit snug. However, the leather is very soft and I imagine they will stretch a bit over time and fit nicely. I believe a 10 would have fit but not in the right way. I am very happy with my purchase but do size up at least a 1/2 size.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLea

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, comfortable and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I must love these! This is my second pair! I just keep reordering after I wear them out!! Great to buy them on Amazon as well! These are so cute but understated. I feel like Audrey!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Simple black flats that stay on your feet!
customer_reviews.text: Simple black flats made of soft leather. They're stretchy flats so they don't slip off at the heel like so many others do. I like that even though it's a stretchy flat it doesn't look like you're just wearing thick socks. Although, they have a nicely padded footbed, there is not much support. After walking on cobble or other bumpy surfaces for a while your feet may become sore. There was some variation between my two shoes at the toe, but I think it's because of the natural material variation. Overall, very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Half size too small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute, but definitely a half size too small. I am considering exchanging them for the next half size up, but the heel feels like it might not be comfortable, so I think I'll just return them. The heel of the shoe cuts into the back of my heel.
customer_reviews.author: NCEllen

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Vince Camuto flats, I read reviews on it before I had made my purchase. Most reviews said it's true to sizing, so I bought a 5, which is what I normally wear. They were initially tight at first but I eventually broke it out but it's still a bit tight. I don't find it too horrible but a bit more room wouldn't hurt. I think they are cute and comfy but I would recommend going up a size if anyone buys this pair of flats.
customer_reviews.author: Tina_Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Supple Patent Leather
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on 1st wearing. Gorgeously constructed in soft black patent leather. Goes well with my patent leather Dooney and Bourke handbag! Both my friend and I recently said that we were glad to see more patent leather of this quality. I enjoyed them so much that I just purchased another pair in the Bisque color. Thank you, Vince Camuto and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Owl

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very nice, soft and supportive. However, My feet are wide and the normal width shoes were just too narrow. I returned them for something else. They were lovely in person, a nice light bisque color that would go with anything!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Runs big, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. This is a cute style that I see a lot of other ladies wearing. So far, I haven't found a pair that work right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M

customer_reviews.title: Best flats ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable for a pair of flats! I am very flat-footed and never usually wear flats. However, these are my favorite. They can easily fold and fit into my purse/tote as well. They are great for work.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flats
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly like the photo and fit well. I think as I wear them more they will soften up a bit. I have small, narrow feet and they are a little tight on the outside of my foot. They don't have much arch support, but most flats don't. I am confident that they will soften up with a little more wear though.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Comfy flats for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pair of flats that are comfortable for a good price. I did find that one shoe was slightly too tight for me (Although this is something I run into from time to time) so I had to do a bit of shoe stretching to get them to fit just right. Now that they're broken in, I love them! The creme color goes with literally everything, and they have good arch support. Comfy pair of flats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ann Roynesdal

customer_reviews.title: been looking forever for a neutral color like this.
customer_reviews.text: perfect neutral winter color. No brown, bronze, red, black or beige in sight here. Packaging in the shoe box was over the top.I would call this color cement.
customer_reviews.author: dixie

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat small
customer_reviews.text: The leather is lovely. It has taken longer for these to break in. A bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good value with leather outside and in
customer_reviews.text: Good value with leather outside and in. Bonus; it's a really soft leather. I have a narrow foot and normally wear a size 7 but in flats I usually get a 7.5. The toes of these are narrow but I couldn't have gone to an 8 lengthwise. I've worn them twice now and they do seem to be stretching and I think they will stretch with even more wear.
customer_reviews.author: jennibell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. I sized up after reading reviews that they ran small. The fit is good. Amazing shoes for the price. Lovely quality in dark blue suede.
customer_reviews.author: #1 Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoes at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE Vince Camuto fan, and these shoes did not disappoint. There is plenty of room in the toe box, and the soles are nice and soft. I decided to try them after reading all the rave reviews of how comfortable the Ellen flats were, and I am glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: anchor12

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable with the exception of the elastic around the big toes, after a few hours of wear they started to really hurt. Okay if your not going to be doing a lot of standing or walking
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: They hurt
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my feet even after being well worn in
customer_reviews.author: lisa r

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flat~
customer_reviews.text: I'm a true size 8 and these fit perfectly out of the box. Purchased the black patent. These are great airplane shoes and great for travel (walking around). They are stylish and very comfortable! I will be purchasing other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Di Lee

customer_reviews.title: Soft and supple but a little short in length
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 Medium. This shoe fits a little short. I can wear them for 3-4 hours but after that, they really start to feel tight. You may consider ordering a 1/2 size longer which may allow you to wear them all day. Soft leather but not much support.
customer_reviews.author: ggbinwa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Classic
customer_reviews.text: My feet are very picky. I absolutely love these shoes. They are so comfortable to wear all day and through the night - dressed up or dressed down. Will definitely order another pair and plan on using these for an upcoming month long European vacation where I intend to walk a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A Proud Wife

customer_reviews.title: I love the quality of this product
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement pair for one that I used and abused for 3 years. I love the quality of this product. I hope they do not stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They run small.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! They’re so pretty! One problem - THEYRE TOO SMALL!!! Now they’re sold out and may not be back in stock. I’m so disappointed. If you get the chance to buy them again buy 1/2 to 1 size bigger. Amazon, you should let people know that!
customer_reviews.author: LoveTheSky

customer_reviews.title: High quality construction and material
customer_reviews.text: I have small but slightly wide feet. I threw away my last pair of flats because they pinched so much at my pinkie toes. But these are extremely comfortable. it is high quality construction with good material. The price is reasonable for what you get. I normally wear 5.5, but bought size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Curious_J

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Working Women!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical at the overly joyous and positive reviews but after receiving the shoes, I take back all skepticism! All of these people are right! These are by far the most comfortable flats I've ever owned. My #1 criticism of flats is usually that the back part rubs against my skin, however, I don't have that problem with these which is unheard of.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine P.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable flats I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable flats I've ever worn. They are so soft, flexible, and supple, while still providing decent support (for flats). I wore these to death! To the point they were peeling and cracking and I had to throw them away. Would 100% buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: VINA

customer_reviews.title: Ouch !
customer_reviews.text: I thought these shoes looked comfortable on someone else. Unfortunately for me I could barely get my foot in them. When I did, the toe was so tight and the sides too narrow. They went back the same day they arrived. Maybe it was that model. I'll keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Tieks in my opinion!
customer_reviews.text: Best ballets I own! I have a few pairs of Tieks, and won’t buy more, these fit better and are made better hands down! Now I have to find other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Loops

customer_reviews.title: High gloss comfy flats😀
customer_reviews.text: VC flats have a high gloss finish that I like. I normally wear a 6.5-7 in VC. My feet are narrow but I needed a size 7 in these flats. They have a lot of support and feel wonderful. Also the rounded front completely covers your toes. So you don't see the toe lines like some other flats.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Rather small for sizing. I ordered 1/2 size up and could have used a full size up. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair like this that my grandma loved
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair like this that my grandma loved, so I bought a par for her as well. They are supercomfy and stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela M.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Only took a couple of days of wear to break them in! Very comfy and great to walk around the city in.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks great & comfortable. A little toe cleavage. Would be 5 stars if insole was more cushioned. I’m on my feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: KAP94

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but pinched my toes so much that, unfortunately for me, after one days’ wear I won’t be wearing again. I even ordered a 1/2 size up. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and squeaky
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel like plastic, make a cheap noise as you walk. I’m very disappointed in the quality of the shoe and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking flat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe. Comfy too. I would give it 5 stars but I'm still breaking them in. They fit great but the leather is slightly tight around the back of my ankle. Since they are leather I'm trusting it will take a bit for them to conform to my foot.
customer_reviews.author: stephfromNHTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: ... in the house all day and thought they were great! Until I wore them on a flight and ...
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore them in the house all day and thought they were great! Until I wore them on a flight and had connecting flights to catch and ended up with the worst blister on my small toe. Not sure if I'll be able to wear them again. Sad because they were cute!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: also hoped they would be somewhat powder pink like ballet shoe but more beige in
customer_reviews.text: ordered my normal 8 but way too small, had to return. also hoped they would be somewhat powder pink like ballet shoe but more beige in color
customer_reviews.author: Finnegan

customer_reviews.title: Quality Change?
customer_reviews.text: This is the third or forth pair of these shoes I have owned in the same size and when I wore my new pair that I recently ordered online for the first time yesterday I was in a lot of pain by the end of the day, limping and I couldn't wait to take them off! All other pairs were extremely comfortable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ALICE POPE

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to break in. They fit, ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to break in. They fit, but were fairly tight at first. I wear a 10 1/2M, so must buy up a size and even then they were tight.
customer_reviews.author: Archaeogal

customer_reviews.title: Great ballerina flats!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style, is the second pair I own. They are very comfortable and look good with basically every type of outfit. I usually wear 6 1/2-7 and I purchased a 6 1/2 and it fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kay92

customer_reviews.title: But these fit great. Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have these shoes in black patent too. I have narrow long feet, so I have a hard time finding ballet flats that don't gap. But these fit great. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Like pillows on my feet. And beautiful nude color.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Decent and affordable flat
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Vince Camuto flats and this time I knew to order a half size up. I ordered the black patent leather Ellen flat in a 9.5. Typically, I am a 9. Today is my first day wearing my flats and I need to get a heel liner because it is rubbing my heel. Also, the sides of my flat need to give, but that will happen after some wear. Overall, I like these flats and they serve their purpose, which is for work.
customer_reviews.author: Regan N. Toomer

customer_reviews.title: These are great flats though
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are much more "rose" pink than the picture. I looked at multiple images of these online from different sites. Hoped they would be a rose gold color but they are more pinkish than I wanted. These are great flats though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Mecca of all ballet flats
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. My feet are covered on both sides. They are confortable. My feet feel supported. I wear these around the house like slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rose

customer_reviews.title: I bought these shoes just for work and they were terrible. These shoes lasted 2 weeks before the very ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give an honest review. I bought these shoes just for work and they were terrible. These shoes lasted 2 weeks before the very thin leather started to come off. After 3 months I decided to invest in some Tieks instead.
customer_reviews.author: MARYLANDSBEST

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes - pretty color
customer_reviews.text: Haven't worn more than a few minutes yet, but they seem to be very comfortable. Nice-looking also.
customer_reviews.author: Joy C.

customer_reviews.title: In my opinion that's the sign of an excellent shoe - the pair that you reach for again ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Vince Camuto black ballet flats. I purchased the first pair 3 years ago and finally and begrudgingly tossed them when they were just too far gone to be presentable any longer. In my opinion that's the sign of an excellent shoe - the pair that you reach for again and again and if you could, would wear every chance you got. I did purchase a half size larger both times and they fit perfectly! Love love love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Prouty

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy after just a little break in.
customer_reviews.text: I had to work on the very back of these to soften it up a little (cut me on the first wear) but since then they're very comfy. I appreciate the padded footbed; I don't understand the point of thin, hard-soled ballet flats. If I wanted sore feet I'd wear heels!
customer_reviews.author: C. Coffee

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, I bought these in 4 other colors
customer_reviews.text: I ruined my first pair by wearing them too much including into the snow which really damaged them so i ordered a second pair. They are very comfortable, I bought these in 4 other colors, its my go-to flat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of flats!
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of flats and these are far better than any other pair, they are the most comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M

customer_reviews.title: Super difficult to clean/get stains off
customer_reviews.text: Super difficult to clean/get stains off. I know it's suede, so what can you really expect? But still, it's super cheap, short suede which stains incredibly easily and it's really obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulia

customer_reviews.title: Favorite!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these flats! I have 5 different colors of the Ellen flat - do I love them????? They are so comfortable and soft. This is my second pair of Midnight Ellens - afraid I won't find them again. Recommend to all shoe lovers!
customer_reviews.author: ivy123

customer_reviews.title: basic flats, runs a smidge small
customer_reviews.text: very basic style, would have gone with a lot of outfits, just a hair too small
customer_reviews.author: Kelly E

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes! Like other reviews, the toe box runs a bit small. I have small/short toes and they fit me pretty well. I wear a 9 1/2 and ordered the 9. There is no arch support but the insole feels cushiony and soft. Plus, they match everything!
customer_reviews.author: Jaxrwild

customer_reviews.title: They start to hurt after a while they rub against ...
customer_reviews.text: They start to hurt after a while they rub against the top of your toes
customer_reviews.author: Janee

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Not true to size - order one 1/2 size up. They are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I really needed black flats and these are not super comfy - hurt the back of the heel a ...
customer_reviews.text: I really needed black flats and these are not super comfy - hurt the back of the heel a little - but they're OK.
customer_reviews.author: supergrovern

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe...but not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the shoe but not true to size. I was afraid to order next size as might be too big.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Still deciding if I will keep them
customer_reviews.text: Cute ballet flat Reviews mentioned they ran small so I ordered a half size up. They fit but feel like they are still a little small. Debating if I will keep or return them, I have only tried them on twice inside my house.
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: I have very narrow feet. The shoes are stretching ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very narrow feet. The shoes are stretching out the more I wear them, but they rub both pinky toes. I've never had this happen with shoes before.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Abatemarco

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice cushioning I can wear to work(pharmacy tech on feet all day) on 8 hour days but can't make it the 10 hour days in these. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: katybean

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Tried to wear as walking shoes in Europe. I looked adorable and my heels bled. Perfect for brunch.
customer_reviews.author: DesireeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for pink flats for a while. I was thrilled to find these for such a great price. They are stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Luna

customer_reviews.title: These are great basic flats for wearing to work
customer_reviews.text: These are great basic flats for wearing to work, although they do seem to run a bit small. I am hoping they relax a little with more wear, as they hurt one spot on my foot by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: My second pair...
customer_reviews.text: My first pair have lasted beautifully for over two years and are still just fine after lots of wear. This pair looks and feels like they will stand up well and beautifully too. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Toe box too short even for a ballet flat
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is sooooo short I feel like my foot could fall out at any moment. Also sewn edges inside shoe rub uncomfortably on my feet in several places
customer_reviews.author: Pattik

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather The back of shoe bulges a little on ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoe, size as expected.Nice leather The back of shoe bulges a little on the side but I think it's due to the elasticized heel. Wish it didn't happen but still kept the shoe
customer_reviews.author: looking for the perfect shoe

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pair of flats
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pair of flats. The leather is super soft even though brand new. The shape and black color goes well with almost any outfit. I'm glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Chu

customer_reviews.title: The shoe runs small, tight across the toes. ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs small, tight across the toes. I went up a half size thinking it would help but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: These soles of the shoes are great, especially for flats
customer_reviews.text: These soles of the shoes are great, especially for flats. If only the rest of the shoe didn't take forever to break in. I still find just rubbing after a handful of wears. Not as comfortable as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Scotti Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rose Gold Color...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the shoe. Expected it to be more comfortable for the price. A little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: at521

customer_reviews.title: A little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Digs into my heels. Maybe once they are fully broken in they won't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Love these flats in general and have several pairs but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these flats in general and have several pairs but for this one the leather or construction is slightly different and they gives me blisters where it rubs on my small toe.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable flat I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable flat ever. so very versatile. I wear them until they completely give out and then buy the exact same pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mikie lancaster

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look, but they fit weird, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lila's Kindle Account

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! I have been looking for flats for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I have been looking for flats for awhile and these are perfect. I ordered Easy Spirit and Born ones as well to try out. The others cut into my heel and these don't. These also look really cute... some of the other make your feet look like they are in a box:)
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Vince Camuto shoes before I can tell that these are fabulous, feminine, excellent design and high quality! I want to buy another pair of shoes like these in another color. I definitely recommend them!!
customer_reviews.author: Natss

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced falling apart - save your money
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these shoes. They fit great and looked good for awhile. But then the front started falling off and they just look like cheap black shoes. For the price paid I would have expected them to not fall apart within a couple months. Really disappointed. I would say save your money and just buy a cheaper pair they will probably last longer than these did.
customer_reviews.author: Shell Burger

product_meta.title: Vince Camuto Women's Ellen Ballet Flat
product_meta.description:
Vince Camuto crafts a classic flat with a timeless appeal and a flattering fit.

Vince Camuto is a true footwear innovator, both of design and of industry. The designer and creator of the Camuto group, Vince Camuto produces many brands and styles, and Vince Camuto women's shoes are among the most beautiful and finely crafted footwear available.
